Package com.zetcode

Class Missile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zetcode.Sprite
      • com.zetcode.Missile
  • public class Missile
extends Sprite
    Here we have a new sprite called Missile. The missile moves at constant speed. When it hits the right border of the Board, it becomes invisible. It is then removed from the list of missiles. Missiles move in one direction only. They disappear after they reach the right window border.
    Author:
    G.I.
